Text.Page:
We need some mutated plague cores from Akasha's Hideout.

You'll find them with {@LinkCreature:493#5005#Akasha}, {@LinkCreature:493#5004#Shargrim}, and {@LinkCreature:493#5003#Lugribar}.

Report to Tifane when you've finished.
Great job. Please continue to help us collect mutated plague cores.
We must gather more mutated plague cores.
